supplier_of: farm machinery | steels and metals - surface treatment and coating | surface treatment
information: ADI CARBURES specialises in the application of tungsten and chrome carbide for all standard and bespoke spare parts for farming. We simultaneously process tungsten carbide plates as well as chrome and boron carbide wire. In numerous applications, boron carbide is applied behind tungsten carbide to provide exceptional protection for our parts. Their life span is 4 to 10 times longer than traditional parts. We are currently the only company on the market able to provide the following services: - A comprehensive range of carbide parts for all spar parts.- The possibility of full repairing all your used parts with carbide.- Satisfy your request for bespoke carbide parts.
keywords: Steels and metals - surface treatment and coating, Surface treatment, farm machinery
